name: Thirstcoin
description: THIRSTCOIN is powered by Solana and thirst. THIRSTCOINS come with benefits. It is a decentralized, culture-forward memecoin built by a collective of world-famous models and creatives. It is not a security, utility, or investment vehicle. It is a digital collectible and cultural artifact that thrives on participation, humor, and aesthetic thirst. There are NO PROMISES of profit, gated access, or exclusive perks for holders. Content shared by the community—including models—may reference or celebrate THIRSTCOIN. THIRSTCOIN is a vibes-only token designed to reward cultural participation, not speculation.
